name: Ratlike64
description:
Made for the RatJam and SizeJam.

It sometimes crashes on Startup, haven't figured out why, just reopen it if it does, might take a few times, but eventually it will start and work.

W, A, S, D for the 4 directions are the only Controls.

Ratlike64_WS contains the Sourceproject aswell as the build executeable. Keep in mind this was rushed for 2 Jams and isn't very clean Code, and certainly not using best practices or anything like that.

Ratlike64 contains all the needed Parts to run on Windows, just extract and run the .exe

Total unpacked Filesize for Ratlike64 is 56.004 Bytes. Executable takes 53.248Bytes, Ressource folder 2756 Bytes.

I can't properly build for Linux as I made heavy use of the Win32 API and don't have a Linux to build and test on, sorry.
